Boo's There?

Gameplay Programmer

September 2023 - December 2023

Project Team: Open Alpha

Genre: Puzzle Adventure

Engine: Unity

Version Control: Github

Coding Language: C#

Special Skills: Yarnspinner

Release Platform: Steam

Boo's there? is a puzzle adventure game set during Halloween in which you use your toolkit of monster-hunting detective tools to find out if those at your doorstep are mischievous children or sinister monsters!

As a Gameplay Programmer I was responsible for:

  • Working with the Game Design team to create monster-hunting detective tools
  • Creating animation triggers and sound triggers based on input from the Game Design Team, Sound Design Team, and Producers
